Title: The Good Earth
Director: Sidney Franklin, Victor Fleming, Gustav Machat√Ω, Sam Wood
Writer: Talbot Jennings (screen play), Tess Slesinger (screen play), Claudine West (screen play), Pearl S. Buck (based upon the novel by)
Actors: Paul Muni, Luise Rainer, Walter Connolly, Tilly Losch
Plot: The story of a farmer in China: a story of humility and bravery. His father gives Wang Lung a freed slave as wife. By diligence and frugality the two manage to enlarge their property. But then a famine forces them to leave their land and live in the town. However it turns out to be a blessing in disguise for them...
